data.title: HIS 800 Historiography and Criticism: Research Guide
data.meta_description: Go to this site to find resources for HIS 800
data.text: The following list is a sampling of collections that would have sufficient content to meet the requirements of the archives assignment. Make sure to view the finding aid through the link as many of these are multiple boxes and you should be prepared to ask for a specific box. For other options, see the full list of collections, or use subject headings to access collections that include content for specific areas of interest.
